src:
Klasemen Serie A Setelah AC Milan Kalahkan SPAL
01 Nov 2019, 08:19 by Bola.net
Bola.net - AC Milan menutup pekan ke-10 Serie A 2019/2020 yang digelar tengah pekan ini. Berjumpa dengan SPAL di San Siro, Milan menang dengan skor 1-0 pada laga Jumat (1/11/2019) dini hari WIB.
AC Milan tampil dengan susunan pemain yang agresif saat berjumpa SPAL. Pelatih Stefano Pioli menurunkan tim terbaiknya. Rossoneri tampil dominan dan mendapat banyak peluang sejak awal laga.
Hanya saja, upaya Hakan Calhanoglu dan kolega belum juga berbuat manis di babak pertama. Milan baru mencetak gol di babak kedua, tepatnya menit ke-63. Tendangan bebas Suso membobol gawang SPAL.
Hasil ini sangat penting bagi Milan, khususnya pelatih Stefano Pioli. Sebab, ini adalah kemenangan perdana Pioli sebagai pelatih Milan. Di laga debutnya sebagai pelatih, Milan kalah dengan skor 2-1 dari AS Roma.
text:
Serie A Standings After AC Milan Beat SPAL
Nov 01 2019, 08:19 by Bola.net
Bola.net - AC Milan closed the 10th week of Serie A 2019/2020 which was held in the middle of this week. Meet SPAL at San Siro, Milan won with a score of 1-0 in the match on Friday (11/01/2019) early morning hrs.
AC Milan appeared with an aggressive arrangement of players when meeting SPAL. Coach Stefano Pioli fielded his best team. The Rossoneri appeared dominant and had many chances from the start.
It's just that the efforts of Hakan Calhanoglu and colleagues haven't done anything sweet in the first round. Milan only scored in the second half, precisely the 63rd minute. Suso's free kick breaks the SPAL goal.
This result is very important for Milan, especially coach Stefano Pioli. Because, this is Pioli's inaugural victory as Milan coach. In his debut match as a coach, Milan lost 2-1 to AS Roma.
